attr.title: Habroxia
attr.desc: Blast your way through a myriad of extra-terrestrial incursions in this arcade-style scrolling shooter! Pilot the ship Habroxia through 15 levels featuring intense boss fights, rescue missions, shifting perspectives, and untold surprises.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy all game files into the assets folder. You can also use the free demo.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2290270/Habroxia/) and copy all game files into the `assets` folder.
